body_html:
Suppose your input tensorflow looks like where you are accepting int values

input_x=tf.placeholder(name='input_',shape=[4,3,2],dtype=tf.int32)
now just use tf.cast method

input_x = tf.cast(input_x,tf.float32)
and feed it to rnn .
body_text:
Suppose your input tensorflow looks like where you are accepting int values
input_x=tf.placeholder(name='input_',shape=[4,3,2],dtype=tf.int32) 
now just use tf.cast method
input_x = tf.cast(input_x,tf.float32) 
and feed it to rnn .
body:
Suppose your input tensorflow looks like where you are accepting int values

`input_x=tf.placeholder(name='input_',shape=[4,3,2],dtype=tf.int32)
`
now just use tf.cast method

`input_x = tf.cast(input_x,tf.float32)
`
and feed it to rnn .
